episodes.title: Inside America's Most Brutal Cults Compilation | Twisted Tales
episodes.description:
Cult of Personality | Twisted Tales

Watch 'Inside America’s Most Dangerous Cults Compilation' here: https://youtu.be/AYPy8jJSPKY

00:00 The Manson Family 

Charles Manson, a former con man turned guru of a hippie commune isolated in the Californian desert, has followers who are willing to kill for him.

44:30 The Children of God

David Berg's entire belief system and his lifestyle are so uniquely shocking.

01:27:57 Jonestown

Jim Jones, a charismatic but tyrannical preacher, leads his followers into the remote commune of Jonestown, Guyana.

episodes.title: Inside America’s Most Dangerous Cults Compilation | Twisted Tales
episodes.description:
Cult of Personality | Twisted Tales

00:00 Moonies 

Moonies are told that they are on a mission to save humanity; but in reality, they are just building an empire for their Messiah, Sun Myung Moon, the all powerful reverend of the Unification Church.

44:16 David Koresh and the Waco Siege

David Koresh, the so-called Sinful Messiah of Waco, Texas, prepares his followers for a battle with the federal government, but he also sleeps with whomever he chooses, including preteen girls.

01:29:00 Warren Jeffs and the Church of Jesus Christ

At the border of Utah and Arizona, a remote theocratic community has been thriving for decades; they live in full obedience to a spiritual leader by the name of Warren Jeffs, the prophet of the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ.

episodes.title: David Koresh: Last Stand in Waco
episodes.description:
One of the most notorious religious leaders in the United States, David Koresh, and 83 of his followers have been trapped inside their Waco, Texas compound for over 50 days. Unwilling to surrender and surrounded by authorities, the siege is the longest modern-day standoff in American law enforcement history. Final 24 documents the final moments of the infamous preacher's life.

About this Series

From JFK Jr., to Anna Nicole Smith, to Jim Morrison, Final 24 finds out what happened in the final hours of the world's most celebrated icons. Dramatic investigations reveal the hidden secrets, psychological flaws, and tragic events that resulted in their untimely deaths.

episodes.title: Jonestown: The Deep Fall of the Peoples Temple Cult | Paradise Lost | Twisted Tales
episodes.description:
Jonestown: Paradise Lost | Twisted Tales

Watch 'The Hells Angels' here: https://youtu.be/Dd-WgL5SHGA

This documentary delves into the final chapters of the Peoples Temple saga in Jonestown, Guyana. Through a combination of survivor testimonials and dramatic reenactments, it portrays the escalating paranoia and erratic behavior of Reverend Jim Jones as internal and external pressures mount. Congressman Leo Ryan's insistence on visiting triggers a tense standoff as Jones vacillates between allowing and resisting the visit. Unexpected defections during the visit catch Jones off guard, prompting drastic actions. In the end over 900 individuals, including men, women, and children, found themselves entangled in a web of manipulation and coercion, ultimately resulting in a devastating loss of life.
